RoomComponent.m_description: A breeze blows in your face as you stand atop a hill. Thick grass blankets the top of the hill.  Before you, whole trees have been woven togther to form a dense wall of branches.  You circle the wall until you find an opening.  Before the door, bones lie scattered around a smoking firepit.  This must be an ogre's lair.  Not far away, the brush and trees thicken as the forest grows deeper.
